divs: Sighting DetailsOn October 6, 2006, during the full harvest moon I snapped off a few pictures while taking my dog out. The sky and the moon were absolutely beautiful! At the time I was taking these photo's there was absolutely No air traffic whatsoever. Later, after I had come in and downloaded my pictures I was amazed! The lights I captured in the sky that are moving and darting in and out of the clouds and changing really took me by surprise. I have six pictures all together with these lights in them. I wish I could show them to everyone in full screen and in the order I took them because it is like watching a mini movie as you can clearly see how the lights are moving through the sky. I took these photos without flash with a Konica Minolta 12 x zoom, anti-shake digital camera. Thanks, Michelle
Summary: Lights in night sky moving in and out of the clouds
